parameters.name: AdjustType
parameters.description: The type of the consumption amount adjustment. Valid values: increase: The consumption amount increases because new consumption occurs. decrease: The consumption amount decreases because funds are added to the account. This parameter is required.

parameters.name: Amount
parameters.description: The amount to be adjusted. Unit: CNY

parameters.name: ExtendMap
parameters.description: The extended field of a message.

parameters.name: OutBizId
parameters.description: The ID of the primary key for external business. The ID is used for idempotence verification.

parameters.name: Source
parameters.description: The source of the request. Specify the system name for the parameter.
